targets.expr: round(sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service"}[30s])), 0.001)

sum(irate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service",response_code!~"5.*"}[30s])) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service"}[30s]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) by (le))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) by (le))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source",destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) by (le))
sum(irate(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="source", destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) + sum(irate(istio_tcp_received_bytes_total{reporter="source", destination_service=~"$service"}[1m]))
round(sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination",destination_service=~"$service"}[30s])), 0.001)

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="destination",destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) by (le))

sum(irate(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service"}[1m])) + sum(irate(istio_tcp_received_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service"}[1m]))

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{connection_security_policy="mutual_tls",destination_service=~"$service",reporter="source",source_workload=~"$srcwl",source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}[30s])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace, response_code), 0.001)

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", destination_service=~"$service", reporter="source", source_workload=~"$srcwl", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}[30s])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace, response_code), 0.001)

panels.title: Incoming Requests by Source And Response Code

targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", destination_service=~"$service",response_code!~"5.*", source_workload=~"$srcwl", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}[30s])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace) / sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", destination_service=~"$service", source_workload=~"$srcwl", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}[30s])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace)

panels.title: Bytes Sent to Incoming TCP Connection

list.label: Client Workload Namespace
list.name: srcns
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_service="$service"}) by (source_workload_namespace) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service"}) by (source_workload_namespace))

list.label: Client Workload
list.name: srcwl
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload))

list.label: Service Workload Namespace
list.name: dstns
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_service="$service"}) by (destination_workload_namespace) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service"}) by (destination_workload_namespace))

list.label: Service Workload
list.name: dstwl
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", destination_workload_namespace=~"$dstns"}) by (destination_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", destination_workload_namespace=~"$dstns"}) by (destination_workload))
